name: Silvers Rayleigh
text:
You cannot have cards with a cost of 5 or greater in your deck, according to the rules.
Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may reveal 2 Event cards from your hand: Give up to 1 of your Character with a base power of 4000 or less +2000 power during this turn.

effect.text: You may reveal 2 Event cards from your hand: Give up to 1 of your Character with a base power of 4000 or less +2000 power during this turn.
conditions: Character with a base power of 4000 or less
